analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham hetum dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na hetu dhammo uppajjati

original: hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu
analyzed: hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na hetu ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na hetu dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti
analyzed: na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na hetu ca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti
hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
